g.font-family: "ヒラギノ角ゴ Pro W3", "Hiragino Kaku Gothic Pro", Osaka, "メイリオ", Meiryo, "ＭＳ Ｐゴシック", "MS PGothic"

text.font-family: "ヒラギノ角ゴ Pro W3", "Hiragino Kaku Gothic Pro", Osaka, "メイリオ", Meiryo, "ＭＳ Ｐゴシック", "MS PGothic"
text.tspan: Pokémon Mystery Dungeon is an RPG/Roguelike
featuring Pokémon. Pokémon Mystery Dungeon's story
is simple enough for almost anyone to understand, and
gets the job done. It doesn't feature many B-Plots or
complex story arks, but it ties together an otherwise
really fun Roguelike into something special. The game
also features many moves and Pokémon from the
